messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Good Morning crew we are happy to announce our new lavaland mine upon Borehole Mining Site 7 in your sector we have programmed your gateway to go visit their site as a secondary mission could you repair their comms equipment? we have not recived a transmission from them for a long time Have a nice day crew.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We have also removed all the restrictions on your gateway aswell have a nice day

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: Ok crew, I will be heading the Expedition to the ssstation for repairsss, Anyone who isssnt vital to the ssstationsss sssurvival and would like to go, meet at the Gate

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Also due to the lack of communication we were not able to put the exit directly in the outpost so be sure to bring a pickaxe as you will be landing outside but near their camp

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Collision Alert

The station is passing through a debris cloud, expect minor damage to external fittings and fixtures.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Research Division.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Dormitories.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Deep inside the stirring homosexuality is moving within you.
